item.title: Status Pages
item.description: Various services provide status apis which are accessible. For example, the slack status api at https://status.slack.com/api/v2.0.0/current This can be accomplished with jq and the cmdrunner module. First, create a shell script: #!/bin/sh curl -s https://status.slack.com/api/v2.0.0/current | \ jq -r '"Status: " + (if (.status == "active") then "Active Incident" else "Ok" end),"Last Updated: " + .date_updated,if (.active_incidents[] | length) > 0 then "Active Incidents\n" + .active_incidents[] .title else "" end' Second, the following wtfutil config:
